formalpara.title: Figure 3. Regulatory modules that promote spermatogenesis
formalpara.para: Proteins are shown in uppercase, and genes or mRNAs in lowercase italics. Positive interactions are indicated with an arrow, and negative ones by a “--|”. Genes that promote spermatogenesis are blue, and those that promote oogenesis are red. Regulatory circuits that promote hermaphrodite spermatogenesis are highlighted in gray.
